message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_BIRTHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Citizenship from date must not be earlier than person's date of birth.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_XFV_DEATHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Citizenship from date must not be later than person's date of death.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_XFV_DEATHDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: Citizenship to date must not be later than person's date of death.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Citizenship from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_XFV_START_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Citizenship from date must not be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_XFV_END_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Citizenship to date must not be later than today's date.

message.name: ERR_CITIZENSHIP_XFV_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: Citizenship from date must not be later than the to date.
